replies.body:
Thanks :)
Education in my country is generally bad, cuz of the system, but the best shools are placed in Istanbul, that's why I'm lucky. Actually really good city, expect terror, traffic and bad people of Turkey. Anyways, that's a really good city to go for a holiday but not a really nice place to live :'(

Thank you bro :)
In Christmas, my cousin (bora) [currently banned] and me were at a friends home. Then while my friend was playing, I said 'what's the name of this server?' Then he explained me this fantastic server. When I got home I started to play the server and still playing xd
Lime/Lemon
A guy that has OP videos... A nice friend to rush/def or everything. I hope you join Cronus <3

replies.body:
Hey Borrah, you're such a chill guy and you're a key member of the forum community! :D

  1. When was the last time you cried?
  2. Do you sing whilst taking a shower/bath?
  3. If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?
  4. What 5 words would a close friend use to describe you?
  5. If emotions could be expressed as colours, which would happiness be?
  6. What is your favourite month of the year?
  7. What was your first impression of me?
Have a good one! o/
